thread.title: Sarah Fiechtner

author: Sarah Fiechtner
title: Sarah Fiechtner
text: I was very excited to see a first edition of Agatha Christie on your site, since I have been searching for just the right one for a special gift. The book I ordered came very quickly in the mail and was exactly as described on the site. Condition was great and I am very excited to gift it, as I know how much it will mean to the receiver. The price was lower than expected as well, considering what I purchased.
